#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int T,n,m,t,i, z;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	for(t = 1; t<=T; t++)
	{
		printf("Case %d:\n",t );
		scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
		int x[n];
		char num[10];
		for (i = 0; i < n; ++i)
		{
			scanf("%s",num);
			x[i] = 0;
			bool f = false;
			for(int j = 0; num[j]; ++j)
			{
				if(num[j] == '.')
				{
					f = true;
					continue;
				}
				x[i] = x[i] * 10 + num[j] - '0';
			}
			if(!f)
				x[i] *= 100;
		}

		sort(x,x+n);
		int scenario = 1;

		for(;scenario<=m;scenario++)
		{
			printf("Scenario %d:\n",scenario );
			scanf("%s",num);
			z = 0;
			bool f = false;
			for(int j = 0; num[j]; ++j)
			{
				if(num[j] == '.')
				{
					f = true;
					continue;
				}
				z = z * 10 + num[j] - '0';
			}
			if(!f)
				z *= 100;
			i = n-1;
			while(i>=0 && z>0)
			{
				int c = 0;
				// cout<<x[i]<<" x "<<z<<" z "<<endl;
				if(z >= x[i])
				{
					c = z/x[i];
					z -= c*x[i];
				}

				if(c>0)
				{
					if(x[i] % 100)
						printf("%d.%02d %d\n",x[i]/100,x[i]%100, c);
					else
						printf("%d %d\n",x[i]/100,c );
				}
				i--;

			}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
